def find3Numbers(A, arr_size, sum):
	for i in range(0, arr_size-1):
		s = set()
		curr_sum = sum - A[i]
		for j in range(i + 1, arr_size):
			if (curr_sum - A[j]) in s:
				print("BOR", A[i],curr_sum-A[j], A[j])
				return True
			s.add(A[j])
	print('YOQ')
	return False

n = int(input())
A = list(map(int,input().split()))
sum = int(input())
find3Numbers(A, n, sum)
